Title: Requires electrocardiograms be provided by school health services to screen for heart conditions and requiring electrocardiograms be conducted on students to screen for heart conditions in order to attend school
Summary: Requires electrocardiograms be provided by school health services to screen for heart conditions; requires electrocardiograms be conducted on students to screen for heart conditions in order to attend school.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring electrocardiograms be provided by school health services to screen for heart conditions and requiring electrocardiograms be conducted on students to screen for heart conditions in order to attend school
